card.name: Template
card.text: Template

card.name: Academy of Law
card.text: Academy of Law enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Deception
card.text: Academy of Deception enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {U} or B to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Destruction
card.text: Academy of Destruction enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add B or {R} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of War
card.text: Academy of War enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Harmony
card.text: Academy of Harmony enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Wealth
card.text: Academy of Wealth enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {W} or B to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Knowledge
card.text: Academy of Knowledge enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Death
card.text: Academy of Death enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add B or {G} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Battle
card.text: Academy of ~ enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Academy of Creation
card.text: Academy of ~ enters the battlefield tapped unless another player controls more lands than you. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to target player's mana pool.

card.name: Chromatic Gate
card.text: Chromatic Gate enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap on your next untap step. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Chronicler of War
card.text: Chronicler of War costs {1} less to cast for each legendary permenant on the battlefield. Prowess

card.name: Order of the Acorn
card.text: First Strike Whenever a forest enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Squirrel token. Other Squirrel creatures you control get +1/+1 and are knights in addition to their other types. {W}: Target squirrel gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Gambler
card.text: {R}: Flip a coin, if you win the flip, Goblin Gambler gets double strike until end of turn. If you lose the flip, Goblin Gambler deals 1 damage to itself.

card.name: Flying Squirrel
card.text: Flying Forestwalk

card.name: Dealer of Fate
card.text: Skulk Whenever Dealer of Fate deals damage to an opponent, you may scry 1. Whenever you scry, flip a coin. If you win the flip, you may scry 1 or draw a card.

card.name: Scarecrow
card.text: Bird creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

card.name: Squirrel Den
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on Squirrel Den. {G}{G}{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token for each age counter on Squirrel Den, then sacrifice Squirrel Den.

card.name: Charm Monster
card.text: Enchant target attacking creature Flash You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Slowforged Blade
Goblin Time Bomb
card.text: When Goblin Time Bomb enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of your end step, flip a coin. If you win the flip, target player gains control of Goblin Time Bomb. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Goblin Time Bomb and it does 5 damage to you.

card.name: Forbid
card.text: Forbid costs {1} less if you cast it on your turn. Counter target spell.

card.name: Gather Resources
card.text: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Thunderous Strike
card.text: Thunderous Strike costs {1} less for each spell you've cast this turn. Thunderous Strike deals 3 damage to up to 3 target creatures or players.

card.name: Hidden Ninja
card.text: Return an unblocked attacker you control to your hand. Create a 2/2 blue and black Ninja creature token that's tapped and attacking the same creature or planeswalker that the original unblocked attacker was attacking.

card.name: Manifested Destiny
card.text: Search your library for a card and manifest it, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Honest Attempt
card.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you lose the flip, draw two cards then discard a card.

card.name: Forbidden Knowledge
card.text: Sacrifice a creature, then draw a number of cards equal to that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: False Security
card.text: Destroy all creatures with hexproof or shroud.

card.name: Call Upon the Departed
card.text: Exile arget creature from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has a base power and toughness of 1/1, as flying, and is a spirit in addition to its other types.

card.name: Peruse the Wares
card.text: Search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X, reveal it, and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Surge {X}{W}
